citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 AM on
28-JUN-17.
Licensee was home but was unable to conduct an inspection. The licensee did state that the rabbit & the ferret that
were cited on the last inspection report were examined by her veterinarian.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 AM on
28-JUN-17.
Licensee was home but was unable to conduct an inspection.  The licensee did state that the rabbit & the ferret that
were cited on the last inspection report were examined by her veterinarian.
